attributes.action: Give Lgbtq exactly the same rights as hetrosexuals.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition clearly states that instead of have a single petition fighting for one right, why not fight for all at once! Adoption, Marriage, Giving Blood, Stopping government from 'outing' gay cabinet members etc...

If you agree that LGBTQ should have EXACTLY the same rights as Hetrosexuals then please sign...
